Are you tired of getting lost in the clutter of countless open tabs that drain your mental focus and computer resources? Tab Bomb is here to help you regain control over your browsing environment.

Our Chrome extension seamlessly manages your open tabs by automatically closing the ones that have been inactive for a specified duration, giving you a cleaner, more organized workspace. This results in:

‚úÖ Improved focus and productivity
‚úÖ Faster browsing experience
‚úÖ Reduced memory and CPU usage
‚úÖ Enhanced browser performance

With Tab Bomb, you can effortlessly customize your preferences:

üïí Choose between 5, 15, or 30-minute inactivity thresholds
üîò Toggle the extension on or off with a single click
üõ°Ô∏è Keep your active tab safe from closing, no matter how long it's been open

Installing Tab Bomb is a breeze - simply head over to the Chrome Web Store, find our extension, and click "Add to Chrome." Say goodbye to the chaos of endless open tabs and hello to a more efficient and streamlined browsing experience. Boost your productivity with Tab Terminator today!
